A short career summary

I am currently a senior postdoctoral researcher in the group of Prof. Morgan Mitchell at ICFO - the Institute of Photonic Sciences, Barcelona, Spain. I lead a research laboratory in experimental quantum optics, quantum metrology and optical magnetometry with laser cooled atoms. I gained my PhD Imperial College London in the group of Prof. Ed Hinds, developing an atom-chip-based Bose-Einstein condensate interferometer. My research has been highlighted by publications in Nature, Nature Photonics and Physical Review Letters, and presented at numerous international conferences.
